Title: Unhinged
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Ray McKinnon, Kate Powers, Chad Feehan (executive story editor)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel questions Jon Stern's advice. Tawney reconsiders her choices and Ted, Jr. asks a favor. Janet makes an upsetting discovery. Amantha levels with Jon Stern. Sheriff Daggett investigates a lead.
